game.name: Mimikaki Collect
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Operate an ear pick to clear "ear debris = mimigomi" from inside an ear. There are various types of debris, and removing them earns you money. Use your earnings to purchase new ear-cleaning tools and furniture. Decorate your own unique room with the furniture you acquire.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Operate an ear pick to clear "ear debris = mimigomi" from inside an ear. There are various types of debris, and removing them earns you money. Use your earnings to purchase new ear-cleaning tools and furniture. Decorate your own unique room with the furniture you acquire.
